Static Public Attributes

static const int value = 1 + tuple_size<typename T::tail_type>::value

Detailed Description

template<class T>
struct thrust::tuple_size< T >

This metafunction returns the number of elements of a tuple type of interest.

Template Parameters:
TA tuple type of interest.
See also:
pair
tuple

Member Data Documentation

template<class T >
const int thrust::tuple_size< T >::value = 1 + tuple_size<typename T::tail_type>::value [static]

The result of this metafunction is returned in value.
